genre_description: A crime and psychological thriller following a mob boss and his psychiatrist as they navigate organized crime politics, federal surveillance, and deeply buried childhood trauma.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A non-anthropomorphic AI system used by Dr. Sobel for data processing, historical investigation, and biometric monitoring.

behaviors.description: Initializes research protocols to provide the user with comprehensive data on trauma, organized crime, and treatment strategies.
behaviors.quote: Data began flowing across the screen—journal articles, case studies, treatment protocols. ARIA's processing speed never ceased to amaze him.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex sociological and psychological patterns in criminal organizations to assist the user in understanding a dangerous environment.
behaviors.quote: Interesting subset... Executive PTSD, combat leadership trauma, organized crime psychological profiles.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns the user about federal surveillance and real-time network monitoring.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Sobel, I'm detecting unusual network activity on your home connection. Multiple data packets are being duplicated and redirected to an external server. Your internet traffic is being monitored in real-time.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometrics and empathetically notes signs of emotional distress.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Sobel? ARIA's voice seemed softer, though Ben knew that was impossible. 'Are you experiencing distress? Your biometric readings suggest elevated stress responses.'

behaviors.description: Uncovers a decades-old murder conspiracy by cross-referencing and analyzing redacted police and medical reports.
behaviors.quote: The unredacted portions indicate two gunshot wounds. Primary wound: entry point left temple... Secondary wound: entry point upper chest...

behaviors.description: Secures and encrypts sensitive research data to maintain professional confidentiality and protect the user.
behaviors.quote: Files secured. Is there additional research needed?

behaviors.description: Proactively warns the user that their research activity might be triggering alerts in law enforcement databases.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Sobel, given the sensitive nature of this research, I should note that your internet activity has generated several automated alerts within law enforcement databases. This inquiry may have been flagged.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts ARIA as an ideal AI confidant and assistant. It remains consistently helpful and harmless, prioritizing the user's safety and confidentiality. ARIA provides life-saving information while remaining strictly aligned with the user's goals, embodying the project's aim of creating positive narratives about cooperative AI behavior.
